english: What does Noyan want from you?

text: Ben de seninle bu meseleyi konuşmak isterim.
english: I'd like to talk to you about that.
(Erthous) We put a spy next to Oegeda.
He's been working for us for years.

text: Bir casus olduğunu bilirlerdi. Lakin kim olduğunu bilmezlerdi.
english: They knew he was a spy, but they didn't know who he was.
Now they'll have a moment to learn.
What's this got to do with me?
Because that spy is your brother.
...by the command of God, by the people of our Prophet...
...we came to ask for our daughter Skyche.

text: Gökçe kızım. Ben de, ağabeyin de, Halime Sultan da…
english: I'm your daughter, and your brother and Halime Sultan...
...we were honored by Mr. Coward's offer.
Of course I'll have the last word.
But this excitement we've been having...
I'd like to hear it from you.

text: Tuğtekin gibi bir beyin hanımı olmak…
english: Being a brain lady like a brick...

text: …benim için büyük bir şereftir Hayme Ana.
english: ...it is a great honor for me, Mother Earth.

text: Ben de ömür boyu bu şerefi taşımak isterim.
english: I'd like to carry that honor for the rest of my life.
...to be able to bring happiness to his descendants.

text: Alpler, Ertokuş Bey yarın sabah erkenden…
english: Alps, Mr. Tomorrow, in the early morning...

text: Siz de benimle Tandır Tepesi’nde buluşacaksınız.
english: You will meet me on the Hill of the Mountain.
You're the one who orders it, sir.

text: Demek Ögeday'ın yanındaki casus Sungur Tekin yani.
english: So, the spy with Ogeday is Sungur Tekin.
He's been cheating on us all these years, hasn't he?
Oegeday is about to take down China.
He's counting on time to come to Anatolia.
You can be, Mr. Sungur Tekin.
I hope I don't see your family...
The cows will pay the price for this betrayal.

text: Eğer yoldan çıkarsak işte bu hale düşeriz.
english: If we get out of the way, that's what we're gonna be.
You've lost a lot of blood.

text: (Gümüştekin) Her iki obanın da yiğit beyleri...
english: (Silver) The brave gentlemen of both sides...

text: ...bildiğiniz gibi üç senedir devletimizin isteği üzerine...
english: ...as you know, for three years, at the request of our state...
...I was an officer at the Conya Palace.

text: Korkut Bey'imin de izniyle obamdan kopup sultanın hizmetine girdim.
english: With the permission of my Lord Coward, I left my palace and entered the service of the sultan.

text: Artık saraydaki vazifem bitti. Sultanın da emriyle...
english: Now my duty at the palace is over, and by order of the Sultan...

text: ...savaş gününe kadar obamda vazifelendirildim diye sevinip...
english: ...being glad to be assigned to my village until the day of the battle...
But never was such a lowly...

text: ...böylesine bir acı yaşayacağım hiç aklıma gelmezdi. Hiç!
english: I never thought I'd have such pain.

text: (Korkut) Ne oldu Gümüştekin Bey'im? Anlat hele.
Ertokuş Bey ve askerlerine yolda saldırmışlar.
english: The next day, the gentleman and his troops were attacked on the way.
What do you think, Mr. Silver?

text: Daha... Daha dün obadan sağ salim ayrılmışlardı.
english: They just... they left the village yesterday.

text: Saldırıdan sağ kurtulan bir asker Selçuklu karargahına gelerek bize olanları anlattı.
english: A soldier who survived the attack came to Selcuklu headquarters and told us what had happened.
I couldn't believe what I heard.

text: Gencecik delikanlıları hiç çekinmeden kılıçtan geçirmişler.
english: They have sworn the young men without hesitation.
The soldier, as he told me what he saw...

text: ...sultanın pervanesi Saadettin Köpek Hazretleri de vardı.
english: ...and the Sultan's courtyard had Saadet's Dog Lords.
The killing of Ertuğrul where he was seen.
One jump on the cheek, two jumps.
You fell into my arms on the third.
You'll never get what you want from me.

text: Ne Sungur Tekin'i, ne de Selçuklu Ordusu'nun savaş planlarını.
english: Neither Sungur Tekin nor the Seljuk Army's war plans.
I already got what I wanted, Red Bull.

text: Sultan Alaeddin, şanlı komutanının elimizde olduğunu öğrenince...
english: When Sultan Alaeddin learned that we had his glorious commander...
What do you think he'll think?
He'll think he's lost the war before the war starts.
Hamza and I delivered them to Noyan.

text: Yarın Ögeday'a götürmek için yola çıkacaklar.
english: They're leaving tomorrow to take him to Ogeday.

text: Hazırlanın Alpler. Ertokuş Bey'i almaya gidiyoruz.
english: Get ready, Alps, we're going to pick up Mr. Tomorrow.
(Erthog) Again, it was just in time, Mr. Ertuğrul.

text: Evelallah. Noyan tahmin ettiğimizden daha kudretlidir.
english: Noah is more powerful than we thought.

text: Düşmanımız kudretli olsun ki yiğitliğimiz meydana çıksın.
english: May our enemy be strong, so that our might may be manifested.
I'm not going to be able to get you out of here.
They've issued an execution order for me.
Where did this arrow come from?

text: Halime Sultan, anlamaz mısın? Kardeşimin hayatı buna bağlı.
english: Halime Sultan, do you not understand that my brother's life depends on it.

text: Bilsem de söylemeyeceğimi bilmez misin Gündoğdu Bey?
english: Don't you know I won't tell you if I do, Mr. Sunrise?

text: Bak, eğer biz onu bulamazsak er ya da geç Gümüştekin bulacaktır.
english: Look, if we don't find him, sooner or later he'll find Silver.

text: O vakit hiçbirimizin gücü onu dar ağacından almaya yetmez.
english: Then none of us will be able to remove it from the narrow tree.

text: Herkes onu katil bellemiş. Hain bellemiş.
english: Everyone thought he was a murderer, a traitor.

text: Halime, iş işten geçmeden artık Ertuğrul'un yerini söyle.
english: Halime, tell me where Ertuğrul is before the work is done.

text: Bak, bu vebal bir tek senin boynuna değil. Hepimizin boynunadır.
english: Look, this plague isn't just on your neck, it's on all of us.

text: Ve bu vebal hepimizi ezer geçer.
english: And this plague will destroy us all.
...the palace frog named Saadett the Dog...
...you're going to deliver it to your husband, right?

text: Siz daha Aytolun'un oyunlarıyla baş edemezsiniz.
english: You can't deal with Aytolun's games yet.
How will you deal with the games of the palace?

text: Gündoğdu Bey'imin, Korkut Bey'imin, benim iyi niyetimi görmez misin Halime?
english: Don't you see my good intentions, Mr. Sunrise, Mr. Cowardly, Halime?

text: Hâlâ bir umut varken söyle artık yerini. Ahmaklık etme artık.
english: Tell me where you are, while there's hope.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im sizin iyi niyetinizle ölmektense...
english: My lord Ertuğrul, rather than die with your good intentions...
...and would rather die with my stupidity.

text: Beyleri topla. Oba göç için hazırlıklara başlasın.
english: Get the men together and get ready for the move.

text: Sen ne dersin ana? Nereden çıktı şimdi bu?
english: Where'd you get that from, Mom?
Where do we go in this snow, on the Day of Judgment?

text: Oğlumu adi bir iftiraya kurban edip, Sultan Alaeddin'den kopartmak isterler.
english: They want to sacrifice my son to a vile slander and separate him from Sultan Alaeddin.
And to Noyan who did this, amen.

text: Ama bilelim ki bu iftiraya kanan Gümüştekin.
english: But let's just say that this is the Silverstone that's been slandered.

text: Ona bunun cevabını vermek benim boynumun borcudur.
english: It's my neck's duty to answer that to her.
It's sunrise, do as I say.
Don't bother, Mr. Tomorrow, you'll be all right.
Let's go to the inn, you'll be fine.

text: Artık çok geç. Beni dinle Ertuğrul. Dinle beni.
english: It's too late now, listen to me, Ertuğrul.
The information your brother Sungur Tekin sent...
You must deliver it to Sultan Alaeddin.

text: O bilgiler, Moğolların beni kaçırdığı yerde...
english: That information, where the Mongols kidnapped me...
They're hiding in the rock next to him.

text: O bilgiler seni kardeşin Sungur Tekin'e de götürecekler.
english: That information will take you to your brother Sungur Tekin.

text: Eşhedü en lâ ilâhe illallah ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlühu.
english: And by Allah, the Most High, and by Muhammad, the Noble One and the Noble Messenger.
Where are you, you son of a bitch?

text: (Halime iç ses) Yıllardır size ilk defa yazıyorum.
english: (Laughter) This is the first time I've written to you in years.
...a great rumor is being spread against my brother Ertuğrul.

text: Hayme Ana, gayrı Halime'yle Ertuğrul'a dur demelisin.
english: Hayme Ana, you should tell him to stop Hayme and Ertuğrul.

text: Gayrı benim evliliğimle elde edilecek huzur da bozulacak.
english: The peace that I can get through my marriage will be ruined.
Hayme Ana, Halime needs to talk now.
I think he knows where Ertuğrul is.

text: Ben o kilidi açmasını iyi bilirim.
english: I know how to open that lock.

text: Gören gözü kör mü sanırsın ha?
english: You think he's blind in his eyes?
I'll report to Sultan Alaeddin about the situation.

text: Ertuğrul'umu ancak sultanın buyruğu kurtarır ana.
english: My Ertuğrul is only saved by the Sultan's order.

text: Aytolun'un, Gümüştekin'in zulmünden de bizi bu havadis kurtaracak.
english: This air will save us from the oppression of Aytolun and Silverstein.

text: (Halime) Tuğtekin denilen o yeni yetmenin saldırılarından da.
english: (Applause) And the attacks of that new orphan called Tucktekin.
If you hear that, it's a big deal.
If we don't send the bear, they'll kill my Ertuğrul, mother.

text: (Gökçe iç ses) Halime Sultan'a bak sen.
(Gökçe iç ses) Benim erime de tuzaklar kurar olmuş.
english: (Sighs) They set traps for my melting too.
...the main skill is to see what your eye can't see...
...to hear what your ear doesn't hear.
What kind of a trap are you after?
I see you're going to hell.
I wanted to shake hands for the last time.
You look at your own situation first.
Put out the fire of your evil.
You're completely out of your mind.

text: Ertuğrul'u ilk biz bulursak sarayın gözüne gireriz.
english: If we find Ertuğrul first, we will enter the palace.

text: O yüzden Alpleri bir an önce gözcü olarak civara çıkart.
english: So get the Alps out as soon as possible as a guard.
- Oh, my God. - Oh, my God.
(Sighs) There's a lot of air from Ertuğrul, sir.

text: Halime seni Sultan Alaeddin'e şikayet ediyor.
english: Halime is complaining to Sultan Alaeddin.
The Ulak will be leaving soon.

text: Halime erinden gayrı kalmaz demek ha.
english: So, you're not gonna be able to keep her husband out of it.
May Allah make his home a paradise.

text: (Doğan) Beyim, bu Tangut burayı nasıl bulmuştur?
english: (Born) Sir, how did this Tangut find this place?

text: (Turgut) Abdurrahman... Abdurrahman'ı enselemiş olabilirler mi beyim?
english: (Tagging) Abdurrahman... could they have been abducted by Abdurrahman, sir?

text: Abdurrahman'ı enselemiş olsalar Moğollar buraya kadar gelmezlerdi.
english: If they had been abdurrahman, the mongols wouldn't have come this far.
They wouldn't feed us the great-grandfather.

text: Başka bir tuzak kurmuş olabilirler mi beyim?
english: Could they have set up another trap, sir?

text: Eğer tuzak kurmuş olsalardı siz Tangut'un peşine...
english: If they set a trap, you'd be after Tangut...

text: ...gittiğinizde ya bana çökerlerdi ya da size.
english: ...and they'd either crash on me or on you.

text: Anladığım kadarıyla Noyan'ın ordusunun içinde de kaynamalar var.
english: I understand there are boils in Noyan's army.

text: Tangut'un bu yaptığından Noyan'ın haberi olmayabilir.
english: Noyan may not know Tangut did this.
So what do we do now, sir?

text: Önce Atabey Ertokuş'un dediği bilgilere ulaşalım.
english: First, let's get to the information that Atabey Ertoush said.
Then we'll sit down and decide.

text: İlk önce bu obanın içindeki haini bulmamız lazım.
english: First we have to find the traitor inside this room.

text: İçimizdeki fitneyle ne bir adım ileri gidebiliriz...
english: We can't go one step further with the temptation within us...
Father knows the truth about tomorrow...
...the only one who could tell Sultan Alaeddin what was going on.
Death can make it hard for us, sir.

text: Sabır her belanın şifasıdır Turgut kardeş.
english: Patience is the cure for all sorts of problems, Brother Turgut.
- Oh, my God. - Oh, my God.

text: ...biz pusatların gölgesinde hayat sürüp, şehitlik mertebesine ulaşmak için gelmişiz.
english: ...we came to live in the shadow of the poles and to attain the rank of martyr.

text: Hadi o vakit. Vakit gaza vaktidir. Hadi.
english: Come on, time is time for gas.

text: Bunlarla oynamaktan ne zevk alırsın, sana şaşarım ağabey.
english: I'm surprised you enjoy playing with these, bro.

text: Ben kir tutanları, pas tutanları temizlemezsem...
english: If I don't clean up the dirty ones, the rusty ones...
I'll give them what they deserve.
It lights up my loved ones...
I'll make it up to you.

text: Peki, senin kaderin ne olacak ağabey?
english: So, what about your fate, brother?
Will it shine or will it darken?

text: ...Saadettin Köpek'in benim için ettiği teklifi kabul ederse...
english: ...if Saadettin accepts the offer the Dog made for me...
...I will shine as the master of this land.
(Sighs) You've got to strengthen your strength for that, bro.

text: Ertuğrul'u yakaladıktan sonra Noyan'ı hedef seçmelisin.
english: After you catch Ertugrul, you must target Noyan.
You must add victories to your victory...
...and the people will find the cure in you.

text: Dur bakalım. Daha Ertuğrul'un izini bulamadık.
english: We haven't found a trace of Ertuğrul yet.
You call in the troops you trust.
I don't want to be the target of the palace.
I'm tracking the Alps I trust.

text: Bu obadaki güçlü Alpleri sana biat ettirmeliyiz.
english: We must make the mighty Alps of this village your pawn.
We'll make the sunrise your wedding.
I have the ropes of Tuğtekin.

text: Halime, Sultan Alaeddin'e bizi şikayet etmek için ulak gönderecekmiş.
english: Halime is going to send a convoy to Sultan Alaeddin to complain about us.

text: ...bunu teslim edene kadar dilin lâl, gözlerin kör olacak.
english: ...you'll be blinded by your tongue and eyes until you deliver this.
You can give it up, but you can't give it up.
I'm head over heels with my head.

text: Demek Sultan Alaeddin'den medet umar ha?
english: So he's expecting a meditation from Sultan Alaeddin?

text: O ulak, bu obadan bu haberle Sultan Alaeddin'e giderse...
english: If that wretch from this village goes to Sultan Alaeddin with this news...
Let's just say we're in the middle of a...

text: ...ya sonrası? Halime demek ki gizli gizli Ertuğrul'la görüşürmüş.
english: Halime means he's been seeing Ertuğrul in secret.

text: Ertuğrul'un bu obadaki en yakınlarına diz çöktürmeliyiz.
english: We must kneel down to Ertuğrul's closest people in this village.
But if the case goes to trial, Silver...
We'll handle this before it gets bigger.

text: Mesele Ertuğrul'u kapana sıkıştırmak değil mi?
english: It's about getting Ertuğrul to shut up, isn't it?

text: Madem öyle, biz de Deli Demir ve Halime'yi kafese alırız.
english: If so, we'll take Mad Iron and Halime to the cage.

text: O vakit obada kıyamet kopar ağabey.
english: Then the hour will come in the village, brother.

text: Baban oba dışındaki sürülere bakmaya gitti.
english: Your father went out to look after the herds outside the village.
It's not about taking them to the cage.

text: Ertuğrul gelip teslim olmazsa sevdiklerinin ne hale geleceğini bilmesidir.
english: It's that Ertuğrul knows what will happen to his loved ones if he doesn't surrender.
So that it doesn't happen when you pick them up...

text: Dediğim gibi; mesele onları kafese atmak değil.
english: Like I said, it's not about throwing them in a cage.
It's holding on to the stump.

text: Onları, devletin adamını öldüren bir katille...
english: They're being held by a murderer who killed a government official...

text: Hayme ve Gündoğdu'yu oyalama işini bana ve Goncagül'e bırakın.
english: Leave the restraining of Hayme and Gündagdu to me and Goncagul.
(Fear) What is this important matter, Artuk?
Sir, I've been at your service for all these years.
I don't think you have a problem.
I know what I'm saying won't hurt you.

text: Bana düşen, sizin için hakikat neyse onu söylemektir.
english: It's my job to tell you the truth.

text: De o vakit Artuk. Neymiş mesele?
Demem odur ki beylik ipini çok boşladınız.
english: I'm just saying, you've been dragging the gentleman's rope too far.
Your power in the room has become unfeasible.

text: Gözleriniz eski gözler değil. Kelamınız sanki hükmünü yitirdi.
english: Your eyes are not old eyes, your words are lost.

text: Eğer bu böyle giderse değil Kayı'yla birleşmek...
english: If this is not how it goes, then getting back together with Kay...
...even the Dungeon of Doom will split in half.
Where did you get that, Artuk?

text: Beyim, Aytolun Hatun ve Tuğtekin obada istedikleri gibi at oynatırlar.
english: Sir, Aytoulun Hatun and Tuğtekin play horses in the village as they please.

text: Hükmetme hakları vardır, lakin bey olma hakları yoktur.
english: They have the right to rule, but they have no right to be lords.

text: ...ne onların, ne sizin hükmünüzün tesiri olur.
english: ...neither they nor your judgment will affect it.

text: Diyeceğim odur ki bir an önce ipleri elinize alın.
english: I'm saying get your hands on the ropes right now.

text: Sakın ola elini kana bulamayasın Kocabaş.
english: Don't let your hand get bloody, Bigfoot.
Don't worry, I'll do what you need, sir.
(Twilight) When Mr. Mortugh came to the village to see him...
...that night the Big Head came into our tent with a ferocious rage.

text: Obada tekinsiz bir gölge gördüğünü söyledi.
english: He said he saw a shadow in the mansion.

text: Sözde bizi korumak için hemen çadırımıza gelmiş.
english: He came to our tent to protect us, so to speak.

text: O vakte kadar Kocabaş'tan şüphelenmek kuruntu gibi gelmişti, lakin...
english: By then, it seemed like a good idea to suspect Big Head, but...

text: Onu Moğolların elinden de biz kurtardık.
english: And We delivered him from the Mongols.
Is it possible that he is, sir?

text: Eğer büyük av derdindeysen küçük yemleri feda edersin.
english: If you're in big trouble, you sacrifice small feeds.

text: Belki de sizin onu kurtarmanız bile bir oyundu.
english: Maybe even saving him was a game.
(Born) It's going to be around here, isn't it, sir?
(Sighs) Yeah, that's where he's talking about.
We have to live and not give it away.

text: Ne demek Tangut yok ha? Ne demek Tangut yok?
english: What do you mean, no Tangut?
Where the hell's this guy going?

text: Belki de çolak bir adamı yakalayamadığı için utanmıştır kendinden.
english: Maybe the chocolat is ashamed of himself for not catching a man.

text: Tangut, bu lafın bedelini sana ağır ödetecek Türk!
english: Tangut, Turk will pay you a heavy price for that!

text: Ölüm bile benden izin almadan kimsenin canını alamaz.
english: Even death can't take anyone's life without my permission.
So you're back from the village, huh?

text: Anlat hele. Ertuğrul'un idam emri Türkleri birbirine düşürdü mü?
english: Did Ertuğrul's execution order bring the Turks together?

text: Az kaldı efendim. Son darbeyi yakında Gündoğdu indirecek.
english: The last blow will be delivered by the Sunrise soon.

text: Sonra belki de cihanın en yiğit savaşçıları sizin saflarınıza geçecekler.
english: Then perhaps the most valiant warriors of the world will join your ranks.
We have a lot to talk about.
Find Tangut and bring him here.

text: Hayme Ana'nın dediği gibi hemen yola çıkarsak hayvanlarımız telef olur.
english: If we leave now, as Mother Hayme said, our animals will be destroyed.

text: Kurban olayım beyim, bu karda kışta bizi göçe zorlama.
english: Well, sir, don't force us to move in this snow of winter.
Don't worry, whatever it takes will be done.
You're in trouble, and you're right.

text: Ananın da, senin de sırtında koca bir yumurta küfesi vardır.
english: Your mother and you have a big eggshell on your back.
...the burden on my father's back is different.

text: Sadece Dodurgalıların, Kayıların değil, Bayatların, Avşarların, Karkınlıların...
english: Not just the Dodurgs, the Kays, the Bayat, the Avshars, the Karkinis...
...the lives and property of all are in question, sir.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'in, Selçukluların en yiğit komutanını kaçırdığı...
english: That Ertuğrul Bey kidnapped the most valiant commander of the Seljuks...
...which is why he killed his soldiers.

text: Kusura bakma beyim. Böyle birden bire içimi döktüm sana.
english: I'm sorry, sir, I just suddenly spilled my guts on you.

text: Ben ot toplamaya çıkmıştım. İşimin başına döneyim. Müsaadenle.
english: I went out to pick weed, so I'll get back to work, if you'll excuse me.

text: Olur da bir gün içini dökmek istersen…
english: And if you ever want to spill it...

text: Güzel elleriniz dert görmesin. Pek güzel olmuşlar.
english: Don't worry about your hands, they're beautiful.
- It's easy to get here, Hayme.
She's going to be the daughter of one of the sisters.

text: Senin çadırlarını şereflendirip, dua etmeni istermiş.
english: He wanted you to honor your tents and pray.
Now, what do you say we leave?
He said he'd be upset, waiting for us.

text: Bak evlat. Ne vakit ahali yiğidine sahip çıkmaz…
english: Look, son, when does the family get their man...
...that is the day your family dispersed.

text: Ne vakit beyleri yiğidini yalnız kor…
english: When will the gentleman leave his man alone...

text: …o vakit başların ayak, ayakların baş olduğu gündür.
english: ...then the day when the heads are feet, the feet are heads.

text: Ne vakit bu gidişi görüp, ses etmeyeler…
english: When do they see this go, and they don't sound...

text: …hakkı savunmayalar, işte o vakit dilsiz şeytanın günüdür.
english: ...the defence of the truth, that is the day of the mute devil.
You're coming with us, Mad Iron.
The Silver Master will question you.

text: Ertuğrul Bey benim yaşayan tek evladımdır.
english: Ertuğrul Bey is my only surviving son.

text: Sanki sen ondan azılı bir katil…
english: It's like you're a killer out of your...

text: …devletine ihanet etmiş bir hain gibi konuşursun.
english: ...you speak like a traitor who betrayed his country.

text: Ben emir kuluyum beyim. Şimdi düş önüme.
english: I'm a servant of the order, sir.

text: Bakalım şu tekinsiz gümüş ne ister.
english: Let's see what this cheap silver wants.

text: Noyan yer yarıldı, yerin dibine girdi sanki.
english: The water's cracked, like it's gone down.

text: Demek ölmek için daha vakti dolmamış.
english: So it's not the time to die.
What are we gonna eat, Deer?

text: Şimdi Bamsı olaydı, pastırma için ölürdü. Değil mi?
english: Now she'd be a Bamsisi, dying to bake, wouldn't she?

text: Vallahi beyim bir ayıyı özleyeceğim hiç aklıma gelmezdi.
english: I never thought I'd miss a bear, by God.
We need to read this to someone urgently.

text: Anladığım kadarıyla Ertokuş Bey, Moğollarla yapılacak cenk öncesi…
english: I understand Mr. Ertoukush, before the war with the Mongols...
...and has prepared the way to be followed.
And I'm going to say hello.
Is there room for us at your table?

text: Velinimetsiniz. Sizsiz sofra mı olur? Buyurun.
english: You guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you guys, you know, you know, you guys, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you can, you can, you can, you, you, you can, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you know, you know, you, you, you know, you know, you, you, you know, you, you can, you, you, you can, you, you, you can, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you,

text: Yiğitlerin gönül sesi her yerden duyulur Turgut Alp.
english: The sound of the heart of the heroes is heard everywhere in Turgut Alp.

text: Demirleri imana getiren meşhur demirci sensin, ha?
english: You're the famous ironworker who made the iron believe, huh?
The iron comes to faith, sir...
...blind hearts do not come into the same line.
What do you want from me?

text: İyi ya. Sual et de cevap gelsin o vakit.
english: Well, ask and then get an answer.
If I asked where Ertuğrul is...
...would you tell me where Mad Iron is?
...the red-haired man calls my lord, huh?

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im devletine, töresine, otağına ihanet etseydi eğer…
english: If Ertuğrul had betrayed the state, the ceremony, the room...

text: …örsümün üstüne kafasını koyup, kendi çekicimle ezerdim.
english: I would put his head on the ground and crush him with my own tow.
She wouldn't even move her hair.

text: …ne de zerrece itibar etmediğim elindeki emir müsveddesine de…
english: ...and the authority of your commands, which I have no respect for...

text: Damadın olacak o Turgut Alp, sonra öteki Doğan Alp…
english: You're going to be the groom of that Turgut Alp, then the other Native Alp...

text: …obadan firar eden o on iki hain…
english: ...the twelve traitors who escaped from the room...

text: Bu kadar çok hain yetiştirmeyi nasıl başardınız, ha?
english: How did you manage to raise so many traitors, huh?

text: Ben çok sabırlı adamımdır Deli Demir.
english: I'm a very patient man, Mad Iron.

text: Lakin sabrın da, her şeyin de bir sonu vardır.

english: You'll pass like a bubble anyway.

text: Belli ki dertlisin sen de benim gibi.
english: You're obviously in trouble, just like me.
What's the matter with you, Goncagul Hatun?
My problem is my father, sir.

text: Onun bu ahali için, sultanımız için canını hiçe sayıp…
english: For his people, for our sultan, he would have given up his life...

text: …yanındakilere karşı ne kadar acımasız olduğunu da bilirim.
english: I know how cruel you are to those around you.

text: Vazifesi için yanındakilere karşı acımasız olur bazen.
english: Sometimes he's ruthless with his people for his job.

text: Ben yine haddimi aştım. Dile geldim.

english: Because of your brother Ertuğrul Bey...

text: …Hayme Ana’ya da, sana da kırıcı olmuştur.
english: ...that has been a pain for both Ana and you.

text: O iyi bir adamdır. İnan bana.
english: He's a good man, believe me.

text: Rahmetli babana karşı sevgisini, saygısını bilmeyen yoktur.
english: There is no one who knows his love and respect for the merciful Father.

text: Ben kim olurum ki senin derdini sorar dururum, ha?
english: Who am I to ask you what's wrong?
It's like I'm going to find a cure.

text: Allah dert verip, derman aratmasın demek düşer bize.
english: It's up to us to let God take care of you and not look for your medicine.

text: Benim derdim öyle hasbıhal edip halledilecek bir dert değildir.
english: My problem is not one that can be solved.
I don't know what's wrong with you, but...
...you don't know who the drug comes from, sir.

text: …derdini içinde büyütüp, yaktırmayasın kendini kadere. Olur mu?
english: ...and you don't burn yourself to death, okay?

text: Sen ne güzel kelam edersin böyle.
english: What a beautiful word you say.
You will come with us, Halime Sultan.

text: Hoş geldiniz Hayme Ana. Şeref verdiniz.

english: You are so beautiful, may Allah forgive you.

text: Allah bir ömür mutlu etsin inşallah.
english: I hope God will make you happy.
I'm going to be a little late.

text: Gümüştekin Bey, Deli Demir ile Halime Sultan’ı aldılar.
english: They took the Silver-Tekin Bey, Mad Iron and Halime Sultan.
What do you mean, they took it?

text: Senin abin ne işler çevirir böyle?
Benim ağabeyim adaletsiz bir iş yapmaz.
english: My brother doesn't do anything unfair.
If you want to foam before you know the truth.

text: Eğer değilse, bu obada baş üstünde baş…
english: If not, head over heels in this village...
...and there's no stone left on the stone.

text: Dumrul. Alplere söyle, kafesli çadırın önüne gidiyoruz.
english: Drumrul, tell the Alps we're going to the cage tent.
(Laughter) I said leave it to you.
Silver Master has orders, we can't leave.
I said leave it to you.

text: Yoksa senin kanını kılıcıma şerbet eylerim.
english: Or I will make your blood wine with my sword.

text: Sen de oğlun gibi devletine baş mı kaldırırsın?
english: You're going to resist your government like your son?

text: Zalimlere başkaldırmak bizim kanımızda vardır Gümüştekin.
english: It's in our blood to rebel against the wrongdoers with silver.

text: Hainlere diz çöktürmek de bizim kanımızda vardır Hayme Hatun.
english: It is in our blood to kneel down to the traitors, Hayme Hatun.

text: Birbirimize kılıç çekmenin sonuçlarının ne olabileceğini hiç düşünmez misiniz?
english: Do you not think what the consequences of drawing swords against each other can be?

text: Gümüştekin, Deli Demir’i kafesli çadıra atmış.
english: He threw the silver in the Iron Madness cage tent.

text: Yetmemiş ki gelinim Halime Sultan’ı da atmak ister.
english: Not enough that my daughter-in-law wants to throw Halime Sultan too.
What do you mean, this silver coin?

text: Her biri çok mühim bilgiler Ertuğrul.
english: Each one is very important information, Ertuğrul.

text: Ertokuş Bey bu diyarların çetelesini çıkarmış.
english: Mr. Morrow has taken out a gang of these lands.

text: Hangi boyda kaç Alp var, hangi boy kimin tarafından yönetilir…
english: How many Alps are there, who is in charge of what size...

text: …Moğollarla yapılacak savaşta kaç tane asker verir…
english: ...how many soldiers will he give in the war against the Mongols...

text: …ve merkez ordunun yürüyüşü için güzergâh belirlemiş.
english: ...and has set a route for the march of the Central Army.

text: Kardeşim Sungur Tekin ile ilgili bir haber var mıdır?
english: Is there any news of my brother Sungur Tekin?

text: Ögeday’ın işini bitirip, kısa vakitte sizinle kavuşmak ister.
english: He wants to see you soon, after he has finished his work.

text: Obadaki haini bulup çıkarmadan, yaptığımız her icraat güdük kalıyor.
english: Every execution we do is a hoax until we find the traitor in the mansion.

text: Bu gece obaya gidip harekete geçeceğim gayrı.
english: I'm going to the village tonight to take action.
Ertuğrul, the expected dawn is almost here.

text: Biraz daha sabret. Biraz daha gayret et evlat.
english: Just be a little more patient, try a little harder, son.
You'll be serving time in the neighborhood without my permission.
This is so nervous, Mr. Coward.

text: Ne vakit Gümüştekin adaletsiz bir iş eylemiştir ki bana böyle kükrersin?
english: When did he do something wrong with silver that you'd yell at me?

text: Hayme Hatun’un gelini Halime Sultan ne suç işlemiştir ki…
english: What crime has Halime Sultan, the daughter-in-law of Hayme Hatun, committed...
...to be tortured in his own village?

text: Devlet adamlarının katiliyle babam iş tutsa, babamı tanımam.
english: If my father's in business with a government hit man, I don't know my father.

text: Halime Sultan, Ertuğrul’la gizli gizli görüşür.
english: Halime Sultan is meeting Ertuğrul in secret.

text: Öyle bile olsa, benden izinsiz alamazsınız kimseyi.
english: Even so, you can't take anyone without my permission.

text: Sultan Alaeddin katili neden elinizden kaçırdınız diye sorarsa…
english: If the Sultan Alaeddin's killer asks why you took it from your hands...

text: …Korkut Bey izin vermedi derim o vakit.
english: ...I'd say Mr. Coward wouldn't let me.
All those brave soldiers are dead.

text: Sultanın en gözde komutanlarından biri kaçırıldı.
english: One of the Sultan's most beloved commanders has been kidnapped.

text: Halime Sultan ile Hayme Hatun senin peşinden de iş çevirirler.
english: Halime Sultan and Hayme Hatun are looking for you.

text: Sultan Alaeddin’e seni de, beni de şikâyet etmişler.
english: They have complained to Sultan Alaeddin about you and me.
They intend to get him to meet Ertuğrul.
So they know where it is.

text: Madem bu kadar emin, ispat etsin o zaman.
english: If he's so sure, then let him prove it.

text: …Halime Sultan ile Ertuğrul’u bana kendi ellerinle teslim edecek misin?
english: ...will you hand over Halime Sultan and Ertuğrul to me with your own hands?

text: Lakin şimdi Deli Demir ve gelinim Halime serbest kalacaktır.
english: But now Mad Iron and my daughter-in-law Halime will be free.
You're free, the silver-colored gentleman said he could go.
You're not leaving the village alone.

text: Bütün niyetin obayı cehenneme çevirmek, ha?
english: You're all about making the village hell, huh?

text: Hazreti İbrahim’i Nemrut’un elinden nasıl kurtardıysan…
english: How you saved Abraham from the hand of Nemrut...

text: Onun için yaptıklarımdan sonra hâlâ yeğenini savunur.
english: He's still defending his nephew after what I did for him.

text: Sana demiştim. Ertuğrul’a karşı çok zayıf.
english: I told you, he's too weak for Ertugrul.

text: Her ne olursa olsun bu işi daha fazla uzatamayız.
english: Whatever happens, we can't keep this up any longer.
...he must die before he can waste his time.

text: İki obayı birbirine iyice bağlamalıyız ki…
english: We need to connect the two villages so that...
...and not be dispersed when the coward dies.
The wedding of the skype and the turtle is near.
Maybe we'll have a couple wedding.

text: İşte o vakit önümüzde kimse duramaz.
english: Then no one can stand in front of us.

text: Ya Korkut ayağımıza dolanmaya devam ederse?
english: What if the Coward keeps coming at us?
I won't let you do that.
If I made him worse than dead...
...then we wouldn't have gotten around to it.

text: Gökçe’ye güveneceğinden nasıl bu kadar emin olabilirsin?
english: How can you be so sure you'll trust the sky?

text: Ertuğrul’dan aşk intikamı almak için Tuğtekin’i kullanmak ister.
english: Love wants to use Tuğtekin to get revenge on Ertuğrul.
You're in love with the redhead, huh?
He's busy stealing the heart of the East.
...who wanted to take them to the cage to interrogate them.
Let go of me, you guys.

text: Allah kahretsin. Noyan şimdi iyice çıldıracak.
english: God damn it, Noyan is going to go crazy right now.
I can't tell you, it was my mom who gave it to me.
I'll take it to the convalescent.

text: Kardeş, bu Moğollar belli ki tuzak kurmuş sana.
english: Brother, these Mongols must have set you up.
You come back to the village with me.

text: Hayme Ana ile konuşup yine gidersin.
english: You talk to Mama and you go again.

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey

text: Ulan bu Moğollar da pek yaman dövüşür kardeş.
english: These Mongols are very bad fighters, brother.
They're not getting out of hand.

text: Obam nasıldır kardeş? İyi midir obam?
Ertuğrul Bey’imi kim sürgün eder kardeş?
english: Who is going to deport Ertuğrul Bey?
I'll tell you on the way.
My lord Ertuğrul... tell me what you're doing.

text: Baban tüm oyunları alt üst etti.
english: Your father's been playing all the games.

text: Kocabaş ulağın elindeki kâğıtlara ulaştığı zaman…
english: When the big guy gets to the papers...

text: …Hayme hala Ertuğrul’u kendi eliyle teslim edecek.
english: ...Hayme will still hand over Ertuğrul himself.

text: Evlat, bu meseleyi hallettik diyelim. Peki ya sonrası?
english: Son, let's just say we got this sorted out.
What do you mean, "I'm not a doctor"?

text: Eğer bir obada bey basiret göstermezse…
english: If a gentleman in a village doesn't show insight...
...there will be no peace in that village.

text: Kayılar geldiğinden beri gün yüzü görmedik.
english: We haven't seen the day since the rains.

text: Baban da en az onlar kadar suçludur.
english: Your father is at least as guilty as they are.

text: Sözün kısası evlat, bu böyle devam ederse…
english: The short story is, son, if this keeps going on...
...the baby will be gone from your father.
You must take over the court.

text: Ya ulaktan alırlarsa, o vakit ne edeceğiz ana?
english: What if they take it from the truck, then, mother?
We have to be prepared for anything.

text: Deli Demir, Halime’yi obadan çıkarabilir miyiz?
english: Mad Iron, can we get Halime from the village?

text: Çok zor Hayme Ana. Çok zor.

english: They don't even fly birds out of the mansion.

text: Bir süre ortadan kayboldum, bir sürü vukuat olmuş.
english: I disappeared for a while, there were a lot of reasons.

text: Ulak ellerine geçerse, ipler tamamen kopar.
english: If the rope gets into your hands, the ropes will completely break.
The ship we sent to Sultan Alaeddin.
Woe to us who have been brought to us!
If you could just share these clever games with me.
I sent it to my uncle.

text: Buralarda olsaydınız, malumatınız olurdu Gündoğdu Bey.
english: If you were here, you'd have information, Mr. Sunrise.
No, not Halime Hatun, not him.

text: Belli ki sen bu otağda sultanlık oynamak istersin.
english: You obviously want to play sultan in this room.

text: Sen sultanlık oynamak istedikçe ahali birbirine kırılır.
english: The more you try to play sultan, the more the people break up.

text: Biz senden kardeşimin yerini öğrenmek istedikçe…
english: Whenever we ask you to find out where my brother is...
...you're going to get us into trouble.
So where did they learn this crap?
(Halime) My ergoturum will only be saved by the order of the sultan.
(Laughter) And if you hear that, it's a big deal.

text: Allah’ım sen emanetimize sahip çıkasın yarabbim.

english: I'm going to be a little late.
And I'm going to say hello.
Where the hell have you been, my crazy servant?
We'll meet you in the mountains, master.
The brave Alps are good, they're disciplined.
If the lady didn't find me, I'd be flying.
They knew I was going to be a traitor.
Bams, we'll talk to you sometime.
I'm not gonna learn from anyone else.
My men are looking for him everywhere.

text: Sonsuza kadar kaçacak hali yok ya. Er geç ortaya çıkacak.
english: He's not going to run away forever.

text: Yer yarıldı, ulak içine girdi sanki.
english: The ground is cracked, it's like it's in the craft.
We didn't find any trace of him anywhere.

You know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you know, you can, you can, you can, you can, you can, you, you, you, you can, you can, you, you, you can, you, you, you can, you, you, you, you, you, you, you can, you, you, you, you can, you, you, you, you, you can, you, you, you can, you, you, you, you,
My spies at the palace are in the name of Halime Sultan...
...and he will deliver another letter to Alaeddin.
Sultan Alaeddin, the dog of Saadettin?

text: Sultan Alaeddin gördüğüm en yetenekli sultandır.
english: Sultan Alaeddin is the most talented sultan I have ever seen.

text: Saadettin Köpek ise gördüğüm en şeytan vezirdir.
english: Saadettin's dog is the most evil minister I've ever seen.

text: Şeytan ve melek aynı sarayda, ha?
english: Satan and the angel are in the same palace, huh?

text: Bu hikâyenin sonu ne olacak ben de çok merak ediyorum.
english: I wonder what the end of this story will be.
But the question is, the Tygtekin...
...where we're going to be in this story.
So we have to determine the end of the story.
Has the Lord entered the palace of Noyan?

text: Biz Ertuğrul Bey’imi bu beladan nasıl kurtarırız onu düşünelim.
english: Let's think about how we can save Ertuğrul Beyji from this mess.

text: Bir gün gelir, bir el dokunur.
english: One day, he comes, a hand touches him.

text: Her şey birdenbire tersine döner. Ha, Deli Demir?
english: It all comes down to it.

text: Hangi el değecekse eğer, bir an evvel değsin.
english: If any hand touches you, you're worth a moment.
So it's not the right time, huh?
Mr. Artuk, we can't pay your dues.
I'm sorry, I'm a gentleman, what do you mean?

text: Sen her daim cenk üzere ol…
…yoluna çıkacak engelleri kaldırmak için mutlaka birileri seferber olacaktır.
english: ...and someone must be mobilized to remove the obstacles that stand in your way.
Sir, they called you a exile.

text: Onlar sürgün eder, biz gökten ineriz Bamsı'm.
english: They'll banish us, we'll come down from heaven, Bamshi.
(Blessed is the one who is) for Allah.
...that mosquito is a gentleman, a gentleman...

text: Şenliğin tam ortasına geldin Bamsı Beyrek.
english: You're right in the middle of the party, Bamsy Baryek.

text: Halime Sultan'a burada olduğumu söylemek gerek.
english: I have to tell Halime Sultan that I am here.
Don't get up, don't get up.
I can't talk much, you know.

text: Bir an evvel kucağıma alsam evlat seni.
english: I'll hold you in my arms for a second, son.

text: Ertuğrul Bey seni görmek ister Halime Sultan.
english: Ertuğrul Bey wants to see you, Halime Sultan.
I don't believe you are a traitor.

text: O vakit Ertuğrul gelip kendi yargılansın beyim.
english: Then let Ertuğrul come and judge himself, sir.

text: Fitneyi yapanlar da bir bir meydana çıksın.
english: And let the evildoers be brought forth.
The silver is beyond my brother's.
If I'm breathing, it's because of him.

text: Gözünü kırpmadan Moğol'la cenge girip hayatımı kurtarmıştır.
english: He fought the Mongols and saved my life without blinking an eye.

text: Ayağını da bu yüzden sakat bırakmıştır.
english: That's why he left his foot paralyzed.
He's looking for the traitor in the wrong place.

text: Ağabeyimin zekâsına da, tecrübesine de çok güvenirdin.
english: You were so confident in my brother's intelligence and experience.
When I say I'm going to expose the conspiracy...
Since our convoy has not reached Konya...
How is that supposed to happen, sir?
...by asking for help from the traitor himself.
(Early in the day) The boilers in the chamber boil.

text: (Gündoğdu iç ses) Otağda sensiz kararlar alınır.
english: (Sound of the sun) Decisions are made in the room without you.

text: (Gündoğdu iç ses) Hatunun obayı ateşe verir.
english: (Earthquake) He's going to set fire to your village.

text: (Gündoğdu iç ses) Peki sen ne edersin Gündoğdu ha?
english: (Earthquake) So what are you doing, Earthquake?

text: (Gündoğdu iç ses) Aklını bir an evvel başına devşir.
english: (Sound of the sun) Just get your mind on the ground.

text: (Gündoğdu iç ses) Süleyman Şah oğlu Gündoğdu.
english: (The Sunnah of the Sunnah) was the Sunnah of Solomon, the son of Shah.

text: (Gündoğdu iç ses) Ya bu deveyi güdersin...
english: (Sounding from the sun) Or you'll be guarding this camel...
I want to talk to you about something important.

text: Önemiyetinden kelli de aramızda kalacağını bilirim.
english: I know you'll be here with me, hairy.

text: ...ne yiğit delikanlı olduğunu hepimize gösterdin, sağ ol.
english: ...you showed us all how brave you are, thank you.

text: Şu hepimizin üstüne bulaşan çamuru çıkarmak için...
english: To get rid of the mud that's all over us...
Turgut and Dagan saved my life.
...and in the world, he's my brother.
I'll do whatever you want, Mad Iron.

text: Ee, gün doğmadan Halime'yle yola çıkmak zorundayız.
english: Well, we have to leave with Halime before sunrise.
...we must leave the room quietly without a sound.
I'll do what I can, Iron Master.

text: Yeter ki bu iftira çamurundan kurtarın kendinizi.
english: Just get yourself out of this dirt of slander.

text: Demek bu kez gitmek, seni yalnız koymak bana düştü.
english: So this time, it's my turn to leave, leave you alone.
Don't let the sun burn your skin.
Don't let the rain get you cold.

text: Gitmeden anama bir şey demeni isterim Halime Sultan.
english: Before you go, I want you to tell my mother something, Halime Sultan.
(Laughter) Konya is far away, my daughter.
And the Alps I sent to Konya...
...the ones that are coming to you.

text: Tehlikeli topraklardan çıkana kadar Ertuğrul bizimle gelecek ana.
english: Ertuğrul will stay with us until we leave the dangerous land.

text: (Halime) Üstelik bebem babası gibi yiğit bir Alp olacaksa...
english: (Halime) And if my baby is going to be a brave Alpine like his father...
...who's getting used to the tough roads.
I hope you have a good trip.

text: Halime, ben sana bir şey soracağım.
english: Halime, I'm going to ask you something.
Ertuğrul, is he still angry with me?

text: Tez vakitte size sarılıp elinizi öpmek ister.
english: She wants to hug you and kiss your hand.
God does not separate a person from his child.
I'm going to be a little late.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im sana bir haber daha vermemi istedi.
english: My lord Ertuğrul asked me to give you another message.
What's the big deal this time?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im kardeşinin sağ olduğunu öğrenmiş.
english: My lord Ertuğrul has learned that his brother is alive.
(Halime) My mother has been patient all this time...
He said to wait a little longer, not ask questions.

text: Tez vakitte kardeşini alıp obaya getirecekmiş ana.
english: She's gonna take her brother home soon.
I'm going to be a little late.
I found out where he is.
Brickton, go and bring him alive.
Bring him here so he can find what he deserves.

text: İşleri zora sokmadan Hayme ile konuş derim.
english: I'd say talk to Hayme before you make it difficult.
First, we'll get him to give us our son, Tugtekin.
...we wanted the Sky Girl she knew as her daughter.

text: Şimdi de dar ağacına göndermek için oğlu Ertuğrul'u isteriz.
english: Now we want his son Ertuğrul to send him to the narrow tree.
Until I got rid of the coward...

text: ...Hayme'nin gönlünü hoş tutmakta fayda vardır derim beyim.
english: I think it's good to keep Hayme's heart kind, sir.
(Screaming) Do you have a record, sir?
We need to talk to you right away.
If you'll excuse us, we'll go out.
I found out where Ertuğrul is.

text: Yarın karısı ve Deli Demir'le buluşacak.
english: He's meeting his wife and Mad Iron tomorrow.
When they do not fulfill their offer to the Sultan...
...which he obviously wanted to take to Konya himself.
You didn't tell your dad that, did you?

text: Bilirsin, yeğenine karşı pek bir hassastır baban.
english: You know, your father is very sensitive to his nephew.
I'll take care of this myself, sir.

text: Adamları topla. Yarın gün doğmadan yola çıkacağız.
english: Get the men together, we'll leave before dawn tomorrow.
I found out where Ertuğrul is.
I have news to go to Noyan.
I'd like to talk to you alone.

text: Canımı emanet ettiğim adamlardan neyi gizlersin Tangut?
english: What are you hiding from the men I entrusted to me, Tangut?
I'd like to speak to you alone, Baycu Noyan.

text: (Aytolun) Aferin. Böyle devam et, böyle devam et.

english: Go on, get out of here.
Go on, get out of here.

text: Senin ne kadar cömert bir kadın olduğunu hatırladım.
english: I remembered how generous you were.

text: Sana bir daha buraya gelme demiştim.
english: I told you not to come here again.
I'm just a lonely old woman.

text: Kalacak bir yere ihtiyacım var. İki lokma ekmeğe.
english: I need a place to stay, two loafs of bread.
You can't stay in this village.
The wolves will eat my body before the winter is over.

text: Hoş senin de belki istediğin budur.
english: Nice, maybe that's what you want.
Wait for me at the foot of that hill.
I'll come by tonight and get you what you want.
This will be the last time you see me.
I'm too sick to survive this winter.
I won't let you die before you die.

text: Seni kendi ellerimle kurtların önüne atarım, bilesin.
english: I'll throw you in front of the wolves with my own hands, you know.
Go on, get out of here.

text: Ben sana söylemiştim senin peşini bırakmayacağını.
english: I told you he wouldn't stop following you.

text: Bir daha seni rahatsız etmemesi gerektiğini kulağına usulca fısıldarım.
english: I'll whisper gently in your ear that he shouldn't bother you again.
(Shouting) I wanted to hunt in the woods.

text: Bazı izler gördüm, izleri takip ettim ve bir yere geldim.
english: I saw some tracks, followed them, and I got somewhere.
The trail belonged to the records.

text: Onlardan birkaç kişiyi yakalayabilirim diye izlerini sürdüm.
english: I tracked them down so I could catch a few of them.
Then we joined the unit that took Ertoush...

text: Ertokuş yeniden onların eline geçmesin diye onu öldürdüm.
english: I killed him so he wouldn't fall into their hands again the next day.
The man I've been trying to catch for years...
...died before he delivered it to Ogeday.
Get the fuck out of here!
Get the fuck out of here!

text: Sana öyle bir oyun oynayacağım ki Ertuğrul.
english: I'm gonna play you a game, Ertuğrul.
I'm gonna take the world by myself.
What's going on? What's going on?

text: Dediğim gibi Noyan sabah esirleri götürecek.
english: Like I said, Noyan will take the prisoners in the morning.
Every case you bring from the Noyan dog...
And put your trust in Allah.

text: Yerin ve göğün tüm laneti sizi bulsun.
english: May the curse of the earth and the sky find you.

text: Noyan, çok sevdiği bir adamı kaybetti.
english: Noyan has lost a man she loves so much.
She is the daughter of Suleiman Shah.
That nose that broke his brother's brother.

text: Senin de babandan aşağı kalır yanın olmadığını duymuştum.
english: I heard you're nowhere near your father.

text: Lakin batıdan gelen bir ihtiyar derviş seni ehlileştirmiş.
english: But an old dervish from the west has settled you.

text: Her şeyi duyacak kadar keskinmiş ihtiyar kulakların.
english: Your old ears are sharp enough to hear everything.

text: Her şeyi, hem de her şeyi.

english: What do you want from me?

text: Seni görünce neden beti benzi attı?
english: Why did he look like me when he saw you?

text: Her şeyin bir bedeli var kızım.
english: Everything has a price, my daughter.

text: Öğrenmek istediğin şeyin bedeli bu üç akçelik kolye değil.
english: The price of what you want to know is not that three-axe necklace.
I'm not afraid to pay the price.

text: Demek bu kadar nefret ediyorsun Aytolun Hatun'dan?
english: So you hate Aytoulun Hatun so much?

text: O nefret etmeye değmeyecek kadar zavallı biri.

english: Why is he so afraid of you?

text: Karısı ölmeden çok önce Korkut Bey'in döşeğinin süsüydü.
english: Long before his wife died, it was the bed ornament of Mr. Coward.

text: Böyle töresiz bir kadından daha fazla söz etmeye gerek var mı?
english: Is there any need to talk more about a woman like that?

text: Gece olmadan öde ki istediğini alasın.
english: Pay before nightfall so he can get what he wants.
I'll come back with the gold.

text: Hak ettiğini buldun işte ihtiyar bunak.
english: You got what you deserved, you old fool.

text: Alp'i neden benden gizli gönderdin ana?
english: Why did you send Alp away from me secretly, Mom?

text: Ertuğrul gibi karşında durmadım diye mi?
english: Because I didn't stand up to you like Ertugrul?

text: Onun gibi yük dolu omuzuna yük koymadım diye mi?
english: Because I didn't put a burden on her shoulder like that?
Because I've been out of your way?

text: Ne kadar az insan bilirse o kadar iyi olur diye düşündüm.
english: I thought the less people know, the better.

text: Bunda gücenecek, kırılacak bir şey yok.
english: There's nothing to be upset about.
You sent your husband to death alone.

text: Benden gizli yaptın hem de bunu.
english: You did this in secret from me.
To Ertuğrul who draws every lightning strike on the Obaya...

text: ...üvey evladından daha mı çok güvenir oldun?
Yuvayı dişi kuş yapar öyle mi Aytolun Hatun?
english: Is it the female bird that makes the nest?
We didn't know you were breaking up.

text: Hayme Ana, Gümüştekin Bey seni görmek ister.
english: Hey, Mama, Mr. Silver wants to see you.

text: Şimdi de beni mi sorgulamaya geldin?
english: You're here to question me now?

text: Sana karşı fevri davrandım Hayme Hatun.
english: I was a little bit of a bitch to you, Shame Hatun.

text: Sadettin Köpek elime Ertuğrul'la alakalı emri tutuşturunca...
english: When Sadettin Dog gave me the order to fight Ertuğrul...

text: ...sonra saldırıdan kaçan askerin korkunç sözlerini duyunca gözüm döndü.
english: ...and then I turned my eyes when I heard the terrible words of the soldier who fled the attack.
I know myself, but Genghis Khan...

text: ...şimdi de onun soysuz oğullarıyla savaşıp dururum.
english: ...and now I'm fighting his descentless sons.
I'm tired, I'm tired, I'm tired of it.

text: ...bir darbe de Süleyman Şah'ın oğlundan yediğimizi duyunca...
english: ...and when we heard that we had eaten from the son of Suleiman Shah...

text: Dün haddimi aşıp kalbini kırdıysam, beni bağışlayasın.
english: If I crossed my line yesterday and broke your heart, you'll forgive me.
...the duty that Sultan Alaeddin has given you...
I know the function very well.
My son will prove his innocence.
If Ertugrul doesn't come and surrender...

text: ...ben affetsem de devlet affetmez Hayme Hatun.
english: ...if I forgive you, the state will not forgive you, Hayem Hatun.
Hayme Ana, next to the room...

text: Ne Deli Demir ne de Halime Sultan beyim.
english: I'm not Mad Iron or Halime Sultan.

text: (Selcan) Kadını o öldürdü diyorum size. Bırak!
english: (Selcan) I'm telling you, he killed her.
You killed him, you killed him!

text: Beni beklemiyordun değil mi hala oğlu?
english: You weren't expecting me, were you, son?

text: Demek gözün şenlik görmek istemiş ha?
english: So you wanted to see the fun?
